plot: Casanova Wong stars as a young fighter who does battle with a formidable gang of Mongolian fighters using his "Yang Sun style" to defeat their deadly "Wind Blade Palm".
title: Jin hu men
plot_es: Casanova Wong stars as a young fighter who does battle with a formidable gang of Mongolian fighters using his "Yang Sun style" to defeat their deadly "Wind Blade Palm".
plot_en: Casanova Wong stars as a young fighter who does battle with a formidable gang of Mongolian fighters using his "Yang Sun style" to defeat their deadly "Wind Blade Palm".
